content:
# The stone furnace has produced a total of 14 iron plates.
# 
# Since I need to craft an Assembling Machine, which requires 3 iron plates and 5 iron gear wheels, I will need to smelt more iron ore to produce additional iron plates.
# 
# I will now head to the nearest iron ore patch to gather more iron ore.

move_to(nearest(Resource.IronOre))  # Moving to the nearest iron ore patch to harvest iron ore.
